评论详情: Great Material! This fabric is so soft and very thick. This is very warm. Slim fit, not bulky like a lot of sweaters. I love it!

My daughter absolutely loved this sweater! It is soft and well made and best of all it fits well, not boxy like some. Fits true to size. Might consider ordering one size larger if you don't like that snug tailored fit. I will be ordering more of these from this maker.

This is a very cute sweater, it is thick but the size is WAY off. I am a 4-6 and their size chart shows a Small should fit - NO it does not. I had to return a small for a Large and the large is still tight. So size up.
I received this sweater and was blown away by the quality of the fabric.  It is so soft and thick.  I have gotten many compliments on this sweater. Do yourself a favor and buy one.
My favorite sweater. The colors are beautiful

I'm pleased with the fit. Easy to wear with layers and flattering

I bought this sweater because I loved the argyle patterns.  I was originally going to buy one (red) but was impulsive and bought 2 (black/grey).  I was pleasantly surprised by the heaviness of the sweater- I thought it was going to be much lighter.  They are lovely and look well made BUT, they are not true to size (for me).  I'm 5'3", 120 lbs and bought medium, which is my true size (in fact I sometimes have to get small for certain things).  Both sweaters were very tight, where the front is kind of puckered and gaps between the buttons.  I look like a sausage stuffed into a small casing!  I had checked the sizing guide which put me in a small-medium category.  Then I laid them out on my bed, with one sweater over the other and the black sweater was noticeably smaller than the red one.  They're both a medium, so not impressed with the consistency of the sizing.  I was considering returning but I've gotten burned on that before by Amazon where I wasn't refunded after sending back my product.  I'm trying to wash them and stretch them out while they're wet but I'm not pleased.  These aren't cheap sweaters where you hope to get one season out of them.  Like I said, they're lovely so if you decide to purchase, I'd SIZE UP!!
Love the look always never go out of style true to size completely perfect looks good with my penny loafers

I’m 5’4, 145lbs, 34D. I typically wear size small tops. I ordered this in a medium bc I knew I would be wearing a top under it. I’ve washed it several times and it still looks great (this picture was taken after it had been washed at least 5 times already). It did shrink a bit after the 1st wash so be prepared.

the recommended size for me was a large it fit perfectly. I am rather short. The sleeve length was great. The colors are very pretty. Would strongly recommend this.

This sweater is an excellent quality and so flattering!  I only removed one star because the buttons pull a bit, even though the sweater fits me perfectly and is not too tight.  So I think maybe the buttons and holes could be better designed.  But overall, it's not that big of a deal and the sweater looks amazing.For reference, I am 5'6" and 175 lbs, 38C bra size, and I got an XL and it fits me very well. I originally got a large, and it still fit well, but I prefer a looser fit so I returned the L and got the XL and it's perfect.

I LOVE this sweater. It's soft, well-constructed, and sturdy. Very high quality with a smooth, substantial weight. After looking at the photos, I could see that it has a slim fit, so. I ordered a size up. It fits perfectly and is quite flattering. Now I want it in other colors!  One of my favorite Amazon buys ever.

This sweater is a heavier weight than I expected. Doesn't cling, like most thin knits. Has a nice drape, doesn't pull at the breast buttons, and modest v-neck line. Looking forward to wearing this sweater.

I purchased this sweater February 2023 and packed it away. Did not wear sweater until 2024.  Wore it and got sleeves dirty. Spot wash sleeve before throwing into washer. Red bled into white. It is a faint pink. Looks like pink fuzz from the rest of the sweater is on the white but its not fuzz. Anyone who sees sweater can definitely tell it bled and will know sweater is cheap product.  Can't understand how so many people could buy this product if the colors bleed. I really like the material, weight, fit. Since I packed it away...too late to return. VERY DISAPPOINTED!! Not sure if it is just the red sweater. Reds are known to bleed if dyes and fabric are cheap etc, but this sweater has such great reviews. Maybe I got a bad batch? Now two years later looking for argyle and came across this product. NEED to write review wondering if this happened to anyone else who bought red argyle.

I ordered an XL, and I vary between L and XL normally, but mainly because even after millions of years of evolution, someone has yet to figure out how to make long sleeves the appropriate length for human arms. But these guys know how! So I'm a 36 waist, 44 hips and 38C (but they look more like a B cup). I didn't want this super snug but I did want it fitted. An XL is perfect for me. It's fitted, but not snug, if you wore it with mid-rise jeans it would hit maybe midway down the zipper, and the sleeves don't stop at my wrist bone! They reach a tiny bit past where hand and wrist meet. It's a heavier material and will be so perfect for winter.
